com.androiddevbook.onyourbike.chapter5.model

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.androiddevbook.onyourbike.chapter5.model.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    Settings Contains the settings for the "On Your Bike" application preference screen.       • isVibrateOn

        public boolean isVibrateOn(Activity activity)
        Return the saved vibrate setting
        Returns:
        true if vibrate is on, false if it is not

      • setVibrate

        public void setVibrate(Activity activity,
              boolean vibrate)
        Set the vibration settings
        Parameters:
        activity - activity to get preferences from
        vibrate - true to turn vibration on, false to turn it off

      • isCaffeinated

        public java.lang.Boolean isCaffeinated(Activity activity)
        Return the stay awake setting
        Returns:
        true if stay awake is on, false if it is not

      • setCaffeinated

        public void setCaffeinated(Activity activity,
                  boolean stayawake)
        Set the stay awake settings
        Parameters:
        activity - activity to get preferences from
        stayawake - true to stay awake on, false to work as normal.
